title: Logic Gates
subject: Computer Organization
theory:
Physical realization of Boolean Logic. 
- **AND**: All high -> high. 
- **OR**: Any high -> high. 
- **NAND/NOR**: Universal gates (Can build any gate). 
- **XOR**: Odd detector (Sum in adder).

interview_questions.question: Why are NAND/NOR universal?
interview_questions.answer: Any boolean function can be implemented using ONLY NAND or ONLY NOR gates (cheaper manufacturing).
